title: Commercial activities received a great boost in West Africa due to contact with?
subject: Commerce
explanation: European colonization and trade networks greatly expanded commercial activities in West Africa.

title: Which company introduced the assembly line in car production?
body:
A. Ford
B. Toyota
C. General Motors
D. Volkswagen
subject: Commerce
explanation: Ford revolutionized production by introducing the assembly line, making cars more affordable.

title: What is the capital of France?
subject: Geography
explanation: Paris is the capital of France.
